categories.title: Scheduling
categories.description:
Make scheduling courses and events a breeze with onCourse scheduling. Whether you offer classroom, self-paced or virtual courses, onCourse has the power to manage even the most complex scheduling requirements.
  • Collision Detection
  • Course Duplication
  • Availability Rules
  • Capacity Management
  • Worldwide Time-zone Support
  • Automation
  • Timetable Views

categories.title: Automation
categories.description:
onCourse includes a powerful scripting engine that allows you to automate just about any process. Send automated emails or SMS messages, update records, integrate with third-party tools such as analytics or email marketing, export data to finance systems or your LMS. Automations turn your student management system into a completely customisable tool with your business workflows built right in.
  • Scripting
  • Data Imports and Exports
  • Message Templates
  • Build-in PDF Reports
  • Third-party Integrations

categories.title: Accounting
categories.description:
Financial management is at the core of onCourse software with fully-integrated budgeting, a complete general ledger, built-in ecommerce and payment gateway, banking, reconciliation, integrations with popular financial software and a host of tools and reporting to make managing your finances easy.
  • Class budgets
  • Banking and Reconciliation
  • General Ledger
  • Payment Plans and Reminders
  • Built-In Financial Reports
  • Payment Card Processing
  • Accounts & Transactions

categories.title: Sales
categories.description:
Set up virtually any product, issue gift vouchers or offer memberships using onCourse software. Sell products to supplement student learning, such as textbooks or audio, issue gift vouchers for special occasions or offer memberships to your high-value customers with a special discount on enrolment.
  • Flexible Products
  • Cart & Checkout
  • Abandoned Carts
  • Discounts
  • Promotional Codes
  • Corporate Pass
  • Data Collection Rules & Forms

categories.title: Configuration
categories.description: onCourse software provides many configuration options allowing you to manage your internal workflows, along with easy to manage system preferences. Set your default timezone, set up and manage your onCourse users, add your local holiday dates and much more.

categories.title: Accreditation & RTO
categories.description:
Automatically create fully compliant certificates for Vocational Education Training (VET), or Certificates of Attendance for non-accredited and professional development course certification. onCourse software produces student certificates with built-in verification that authenticates whether your organisation issued the certificate. Easily export your data for reporting to a funding body.
  • Certificate Automation
  • QR Code Support for Accredited Certificate Compliance
  • Certificate Customisation
  • AVETMISS 8 Export

categories.title: Help
categories.description:
If you need a question answered about your onCourse system, this is the best place to start. We have detailed documentation on all the different areas of onCourse. Visit our user manual, ask a community question on our forums, or get in touch with onCourse support.
  • Community Support
  • Documentation & Manuals
  • onCourse Support
  • Audit Logging

categories.title: Marketing
categories.description:
onCourse is the most comprehensive education CRM software available today, making it a powerful tool for effective customer relationship management - and creating happy customers. onCourse meets the business needs of sales teams, marketing teams and customer service teams to create personalised customer experiences and build lasting customer relationships.
  • Contacts
  • Leads
  • Quotes
  • Tagging
  • Messages
  • Product Relationships
  • Notes
  • Applications

categories.title: Education
categories.description:
Whether you offer a small number of courses or thousands, onCourse is scalable to organisations of every size, so we grow with you. With powerful search capability, tagging, auditable notes, document management and full access controls, recording information and categorising your courses is as simple as a click of your mouse. onCourse supports timetabled and self-paced courses of every kind with an intuitive user interface that’s powerful and flexible.
  • Courses
  • Classes
  • Assessments
  • Enrolments
  • Traineeships
  • Outcomes
  • Document management
  • Assessment Submissions

categories.title: Payroll
categories.description:
Powerful payroll capabilities within onCourse software bind your payroll directly with scheduling, so you can be sure you’re paying the correct number of hours every time. With centralised pay rates and roles, managing your payroll couldn’t be easier. Pay fixed amounts, per session, per enrolment, per timetabled hour, per student contact hour or any unit you define.
  • Budgeting
  • Payroll
  • Tutor roles
  • Third-Party Integrations
  • Collision Detection
  • Tutor Pay Rates

categories.title: Document Management
categories.description:
Attach a file to virtually anything and make compliance simple with complete version control included - you’ll never lose a critical piece of information again. Whether it’s documents, images or video, onCourse software provides unlimited storage space for all kinds of files, so you’ll never run out of disk space.
  • Share documents online
  • Share documents via SkillsonCourse
  • Add private documents
  • Version control

categories.title: CRM
categories.description:
The onCourse CRM platform is a highly customisable student management system, marketing platform and automation software that helps you manage the entire customer journey. onCourse is the most comprehensive education CRM software available today, making it a powerful tool for effective customer relationship management and creating happy customers!
  • Leads
  • Contacts
  • Applications
  • Messages
  • Quotes
  • Waiting Lists
  • Sales
  • Companies
  • Corporate Pass

features.title: Checkout (Quick Enrol)
features.description: Where you process all the sales and payments through onCourse.

features.title: Accounts
features.description: The different transactional accounts available in onCourse.

features.title: Applications
features.description: All the applications sent in by students to courses that are set as 'enrolment by application'.

features.title: Assessment submissions
features.description: The various assessment submission records saved in your system.

features.title: Assessment tasks
features.description: A list of assessment tasks uploaded to your system. These are available to be added to classes.

features.title: Audit Logging
features.description: A recorded log of every basic action taken in your onCourse system. Also used to power the 'Automation Status' section on the dashboard.

features.title: Automation
features.description: The main hub for onCourse automations where you access your reports, export templates, message templates, scripts and more.

features.title: Banking Deposits
features.description: Review all the daily banking deposit records created in your system.

features.title: Process payment plans (batch payment in)
features.description: Review and process outstanding invoices and payment plans. In one batch, charge customer credit cards.

features.title: Certificates
features.description: Manage the certification of students who have achieved competency in their outcomes, including issuing and revoking certificates.

features.title: Change my password
features.description: Change your onCourse password.

features.title: Classes
features.description: All the classes that have been created in your onCourse system.

features.title: Community support
features.description: Ask a question to the onCourse community via our onCourse forums.

features.title: Companies
features.description: A list of your contacts that are listed as a company.

features.title: Concession types
features.description: Create and manage the concession types available to your customers in onCourse.

features.title: Contact relation types
features.description: The types of relationships between different contacts in the system. Relationships can be used to link contacts and inherit discounts.

features.title: Contacts
features.description: A complete list of all the contacts in your system, including students, tutors and companies.

features.title: Corporate Pass
features.description: A list of the corporate passes created in your system.

features.title: Checklists
features.description: Create and manage the checklists in your system.

features.title: Courses
features.description: A list of all your courses. Create new courses, update descriptions

features.title: Custom fields
features.description: Custom fields allow you to create data fields in almost any record type in onCourse, used to store data that onCourse may not already have a field for.

features.title: Data collection forms
features.description: Organise your data collection questions into different forms covering different processes. Create separate forms for Enrolments, Applications, Surveys, Parents, Payers and more.

features.title: Data collection rules
features.description: Set the rules around which data collection forms are used for which student process. Apply different forms for Enrolments, Applications, Waiting Lists, Parents, Payers, and more.

features.title: Deposit banking
features.description: Create a bank reconcilliation record for today's date.

features.title: Discounts
features.description: Create discounts and apply them to classes to offer savings on enrolment.

features.title: Documentation
features.description: Need to find out how something in onCourse works? Our onCourse documentation manual almost certainly has you covered.

features.title: Documents
features.description: A list of all the documents you've uploaded to your system.

features.title: Enrolments
features.description: Shows a list of all the enrolments you've taken in your system.

features.title: Export AVETMISS 8...
features.description: Export records into the AVETMISS 8 format for the purpose of reporting to govenrment funding agencies.

features.title: Export templates
features.description: Create and manage export templates allowing you to export your onCourse data into a format readable in other applications. Available formats include CSV, XML, JSON, PDF and more.

features.title: Finalise period
features.description: Finalise the accounting within the defined start and end dates. Once a period is finalised you cannot edit financial records from before that date again.

features.title: Funding Contract
features.description: Create custom funding contracts for any source of funding that supports the student enrolment, and manage available default funding contracts.

features.title: Holidays
features.description: Set the holiday and shutdown periods your business will be closed for.

features.title: Import templates
features.description: Use or manage the collection of import templates available in your system.

features.title: Integrations
features.description: A list of the third-party integrations available to you in your system.

features.title: Invoices
features.description: The list of all the invoices that have been created in your system.

features.title: Leads
features.description: Create and manage all of your sales leads here. Convert leads directly to an application or a sale.

features.title: Memberships
features.description: Create and manage all the memberships available for purchase from you.

features.title: Message templates
features.description: Create and maintain all of the pre-designed message templates that are available to be sent out from your system.

features.title: Messages
features.description: A list of every email and SMS message sent to a contact via the onCourse messaging system.

features.title: onCourse news
features.description: Catch up on the latest updates and news from onCourse HQ.

features.title: Outcomes
features.description: A list of all the outcomes associated with enrolments in your system.

features.title: Payment types
features.description: A list of the different types of payments you accept from within the onCourse checkout.

features.title: Payments In
features.description: A list of all the attempted payments from your customers to you.

features.title: Payments Out
features.description: A list of all the attempted payments and refunds made from onCourse out to customers.

features.title: Report backgrounds
features.description: Your uploaded PDF backgrounds, for use in reports generated from your system.

features.title: PDF reports
features.description: The collection of PDF reports available to you in your system.

features.title: Preferences
features.description: Gives you access to the various global preferences you can set for your system.

features.title: Prior learnings
features.description: A list of all the prior learning records created for all of your students.

features.title: Products
features.description: Create and manage the product items you sell.

features.title: Qualifications
features.description: A list of all the current Qualifications available to set to a course in your system. Create your own if required.

features.title: Quotes
features.description: Shows a list of all the quotes saved in your system. Convert them to an invoice to confirm a sale.

features.title: Release notes
features.description: A history of the onCourse release notes, detailing changes, fixes and new features every time there's a new update.

features.title: Rooms
features.description: A list of the rooms within every site created in your system.

features.title: Sold Items
features.description: A list of all the product, voucher and membership sales in your system.

features.title: Scripts
features.description: The onCourse script library. Add scripts to your system, then turn them on or off as required.

features.title: Security
features.description: Create and manage your basic security settings, your onCourse users, user roles and create and manage API tokens.

features.title: Sellable items relation types
features.description: Create and manage the types of relationships between course and product groupings.

features.title: Send support request...
features.description: Send a request through to onCourse Support using our support portal.

features.title: Sites
features.description: A collection of all the site records created in your system.

features.title: Student Feedback
features.description: Feedback left by the students completing a survey via the SkillsonCourse Portal will display in a list here.

features.title: Students
features.description: A list of your student contacts. Specifically, students are contacts who have at least one enrolment in your system.

features.title: Tags
features.description: Shows all the tag groups and tags you've added to your system.

features.title: Tax types
features.description: Create and manage the tax types available for use in your system.

features.title: Timetable
features.description: A customisable, read-only timetable view. View times for students, classes, tutors, sites, rooms and more.

features.title: Traineeship Courses
features.description: Shows all the courses set as a Traineeship in your system.

features.title: Traineeships
features.description: Shows all the Traineeship classes in your system.

features.title: Transactions
features.description: A record of every transaction between onCourse accounts in your system.

features.title: Tutor pay
features.description: A list of every tutor payslip created in your system. Review and approve payroll for your tutors.

features.title: Tutor pay rates
features.description: Manage the different tutor roles and their associated pay rates in your system.

features.title: Tutors
features.description: See all the contacts in your system who are listed as Tutors.

features.title: Units Of Competency
features.description: All of the available units of competency that can be set as course modules. Create new modules if required.

features.title: Voucher Types
features.description: All the types of vouchers available to sell from your system.

features.title: Waiting lists
features.description: A collection of the waiting list records created by potential students either from your website, or added manually by a user into onCourse.

features.title: Website setup
features.description: Manage your onCourse billing options and your onCourse websites, including Google analytics and Google tag manager.
